RelatedSentence: Police are seeking witnesses to the armed robbery of a popular Hamilton bar almost two years after a similar holdup at nearby Burger King that remains unsolved .

Detective Senior Sergeant Ross Patterson , of the Hamilton CIB , said police were called to the scene of Lynden Court , Chartwell , shortly before 11 pm after reports a staff member had been robbed .
As a staff member was locking up and walking towards his car about 10.45 pm he was confronted by two men , one who was armed with a double - barrelled shotgun , Patterson said .
